resources.string:
The __serve buttons__ indicate 
 
- who should serve 
- if the player may should serve from the right (R) or from the left (L) 

The serve indication changes automatically after each point entered. 

If required (but normally it is not), you can toggle player by tapping it.

This button will allow you to start a __timer__. 

It will only appear when appropriate 
 
- Warmup before the match 
- Between games
You can optionally __enter a color__ for both players/teams. \n\nLong click the serve side button to select a color.
The scores of __previous games__ are visible here. \n\nTap it to see all details of previous games.
__That\'s it. Enjoy your Badminton.__ \n\nStart a new match by tapping this button.
